author: James Van Straten
title: Strategy Stock Volatility Sinks to Historic Lows, Possibly Making Shares Less Attractive
description: Michael Saylor has pointed to high volatility as a reason for owning MSTR, so without it, the stock could suffer.
content: Strategy (MSTR) is currently experiencing its lowest 10-day realized volatility since it first added bitcoin {BTC} to its balance sheet in 2020, according to Jeff Park, Head of Alpha Strategies at Bi… [+2861 chars]
